articles.description: WWE Champion Drew McIntyre used his time in the ring to call out King Corbin, his former tag team partner, ahead of their matchup next week.
articles.content:
WWE Champion Drew McIntyre made a fiery statement following his bout with Andrade on RAW. The Champion called out SmackDown Superstar King Corbin, cementing their match-up next week.
Drew McIntyre gladly accepts the challenge

articles.title: Monty Don shares puppy snap of Labrador Nigel in memory of Gardener's World pooch - Mirror Online
articles.description: Monty dropped the announcement yesterday that Labrador Nigel, who was his constant companion during his many series of Gardener's World, had died
articles.content:
Gardener's World host and dog lover Monty Don has paid tribute to golden retriever Nigel by sharing a snap of him as a puppy. 
 Monty yesterday took a break from his usual colourful Instagram offerings to announce that old friend Nigel had died.

articles.title: Here’s What Socially Distanced Disneyland Looks Like After Reopening - Forbes
articles.description: Disneyland Shanghai reopened on Monday with a new set of safety measures, after selling out a limited number of tickets.
articles.content:
The reopening of Disneyland Shanghai on Monday presented a new challenge: how to social distance at a theme park where fantasy and fairy tales collide with the worldly reality of a pandemic and the need to keep visitors safe.
